thread.title: Huawei brings Force Touch to its phones before Apple
thread.title_full: Huawei brings Force Touch to its phones before Apple - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Huawei brings Force Touch to its phones before Apple
text:
Huawei today announced the Mate S, a new flagship phone that includes a familiar sounding feature: Force Touch. That's also the name of Apple's pressure-based touchscreen technology, which is featured on the Apple Watch and will reportedly be included on the new iPhone.
The Android-based smartphone was unveiled today at IFA in Berlin. It features a 5.5-inch AMOLED display, with a full metal shell and curved back, but most notable are its user interaction components. The Mate S includes an upgraded fingerprint scanner and "Knuckle Sense" technology, first introduced in the P8, which lets users switch between apps using their knuckles. Â»
